slogan: We save your rights and protect your business
aboutContent: Imran Gulf Industries F. Co. is a leading provider of tailor-made solutions and premium quality products, founded in Saudi Arabia with a decade-long track record of excellence. We understand the importance of providing our customers with the very best in terms of quality, comfort, and style. Our specialization in supplying hotel linens to the hospitality industry and luxury bed linens to discerning households reflects our commitment to meeting the highest standards of elegance, luxury, and beauty. Whether you are a hotelier looking to elevate your guests' experience, or a household with an eye for luxury and comfort, we have the perfect solutions for you.
productsContent: Welcome to a world of luxurious elegance, softness, and comfort. Indulge in the sumptuousness of IGI's elegant, cozy and soft linens, curated to elevate your living and sleeping experience.
productNote: Note : Custom made color & sizes available on request

bed sheet.title: Bed Sheets
bed sheet.description: Our collection of Bed sheets are 5 star hotels approved, and have stood the test of stingent quality measures. Available in Percale and Satin fabrics, these come in various shades and design, and are suitable to adorn a variety of household tastes and decor.

fitted bed sheet.title: Fitted Bed Sheets
fitted bed sheet.description: A fitted bed sheet is a piece of material with elasticated corners designed to sit on top of the mattress and underneath you when you're in bed.

duvet.title: Duvets
duvet.description: A duvet is only good as it's filling. The 11G1' duvets come in a variety of sizes and are crafted from fillings made from natural fibers. The natural duvets have the benefits of being both durable and naturally breathable keeping you cozy. The synthetic fiber-filling duvets are designed to provide the feel and comfort of a natural down duvet. They combine soft textures and weightless warmth and are hypoallergenic.

duvet covers.title: Duvet Covers
duvet covers.description: Our collection of Duvet covers are 5 star hotels approved and have stood the test of stringent quality measures.

mattress protectors.title: Mattress Protectors
mattress protectors.description: A mattress protector is a piece of bedding that sits on top of a mattress. Preserve its QUALITY, Protect from STAIN, and Prolong its USE. • Fabric used is 100% Terry Cotton. • 100% Waterproof PU underlayer. • Extra wide 2'' Elastics on 4 corners for a firm grip. • Machine Washable and easy to maintain.

mattress encasement protectors.title: Mattress Encasement Protectors
mattress encasement protectors.description: A mattress protector is an item that encases totally over a mattress to protect it. • Fabric used is 100% Terry Cotton. • Bed bug-proof and waterproof fabric encase the entire mattress • Smooth hypoallergenic surface is quiet and will not change how a mattress feels. • 100% waterproof with watertight zipper and sealing bug flap.

bed runner.title: Bed Runner
bed runner.description: Bed runner is a perfect and ideal bedroom bed decoration. It is comfortable, soft, durable and resistant to fading. Fine professional stitching and delicate edging make it more grading and durable.

bed skirt.title: Bed Skirt
bed skirt.description: A bed skirt is a piece of decorative fabric that is placed between the mattress and the box spring of a bed. Easy to fit and wrap-around style. The wrap-around bed skirt is three-sided skirt made for perfect finishing touch to your bed set.

pillow.title: Pillow
pillow.description: Our range of pillows is very feather soft, fluffy, and sweet dreams approved. Our expertise in the field ensures the 'IGI' pillows feature improved filling for maximum comfort, and peaceful sleeping hours. We also offer the convenience of a pillow menu, with a selection of pillows in varying sizes and designs to cater to the versatile needs of 5 star luxury hotels.

pillow cases.title: Pillow Cases
pillow cases.description: A pillow case is a removable cover for a pillow. It is washable and easily removable cloth over. Our company ensures a soft and luxurious feel.

pillow protectors.title: Pillow Protectors
pillow protectors.description: • Available in Poly cotton Terry fabric Ultra-soft 100% waterproof PU coated Fabric. • Easy to remove and wash. • Zippered closure for extra safety and comfort. • Treated against Dust mites and Microbial.
